titleStmt.title: Stella Meridiana Caroli Secundi regis, &c. verses written 31 years since, upon the birth and noon-day star of Charles, born Prince of Great Brittaine the 29 of May 1630 : our now miraculously restored and gloriously crowned Charles the Second of Great Britain, France and Ireland King, &c./ by several persons of honour.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

notesStmt.note: Some poems signed: J. P., Ja. Shirley.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
